main.name: Andrea Escobar Naranjo
main.description: Professional in Business Administration,actually I am Executive Assistant from Chenmed since February 2023.
main.bio: I characterize myself as a person committed to work, professional ethics, leadership attitude, agility when solving problems, creativity and innovation, with human sense, cordial, responsible, willing to learn and share knowledge. Currently I am Executive Assistant at ChenMed Company, in the city of Medellin.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I am currently studying in the SENA, the technology of Analysis and Software Development, I am in the second quarter. and thanks to the opportunity provided by our bosses, I am learning to program through Udemy courses and also by classes that they dictate us; the technologies that I have been implementing are REACT, JAVASCRIPT, HTML, CSS and JAVA.

work.title: Executive Assitant
work.description: I am the person in charge of managing the office in Medellin, among my functions are: to ensure the welfare of all co-workers, to be the intermediary between my bosses and my co-workers, I manage and organize events, birthdays, anniversaries of the company and special dates, I make purchases of supplies for the office, I am aware that there is order in the office, that the office is neat and everything is in place. I create and update the office databases, among others.
